ComicInfo.Title: The Thief, the Star-gazer, the Hunter, and the Tailor
ComicInfo.Series: Mouse Guard: Legends of the Guard
ComicInfo.Summary:
The night of stories continues in June Alley Inn, with tales of friendship, battle, and bravery. Legends of the Guard continues the tradition of featuring handpicked artists and storytellers by series creator David Petersen with a full serving of of brilliant new art and epic tales from around the Mouse Kingdom.
Note: The digital edition (7/24/2013) for this issue was released two months before the print edition (9/25/2013).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-29 19:59:06. [CVDB419028]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charles Paul Wilson III, David Petersen, Eric Canete
ComicInfo.Inker: Charles Paul Wilson III, David Petersen, Eric Canete
